get.summary: Returns the most recent tweets authored by the authenticating user that have been retweeted by others

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When true, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: include_user_entities
parameters.description: The user entities node will not be included when set to false

get.summary: Returns the 20 most recent direct messages sent by the authenticating user

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page of results to retrieve

get.summary: Returns the 20 most recent direct messages sent to the authenticating user

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: skip_status
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects

get.summary: Returns a cursored collection of user objects for every user the specified user is following (otherwise known as their “friends”)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Causes the results to be broken into pages

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: include_user_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: skip_status
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects

get.summary: Returns a cursored collection of user objects for users following the specified user

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Causes the results to be broken into pages

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: include_user_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: skip_status
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects

get.summary: Returns the 20 most recent Tweets liked by the authenticating or specified user

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

get.summary: Returns the 20 most recent mentions (tweets containing a users’s @screen_name) for the authenticating user

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When true, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

get.summary: Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets and retweets posted by the authenticating user and the users they follow

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When true, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: exclude_replies
parameters.description: This parameter will prevent replies from appearing in the returned timeline

get.summary: Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: the user id of the requester

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When true, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The tweet entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: include_user_entities
parameters.description: The user entities node will not be included when set to false

parameters.name: exclude_replies
parameters.description: This parameter will prevent replies from appearing in the returned timeline

parameters.name: contributor_details
parameters.description: This parameter enhances the contributors element of the status response to include the screen_name of the contributor

parameters.name: include_rts
parameters.description: When set to false, the timeline will strip any native retweets
